content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Haoyu Wang from China. He expressed interest in renting an apartment I own in München.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for my apartment. We were negotiating the price for the apartment, focusing solely on the rental price and not any other costs or conditions.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [ Answer ]: We did not reach an agreement on a final price. The negotiation ended with Haoyu Wang not willing to continue, as he believed 650 Euros per month was a fair price for the apartment considering its location and facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [ Answer ]: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Haoyu Wang, as an 8. He was respectful and straightforward, which made the negotiation process smooth and efficient.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [ Answer ]: I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt
